ComicInfo.Summary:
SOMETHING WICKED; Part 2 of 2
As two of their own fall, the remaining students at Arcane Acre must break free from the terrifying world of nightmares into which they've been submerged. As Skye and the others fight for their lives, a secret almost one-hundred issues in the making is finally revealed.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daxiong | 1 | B | Cover B | Caio Cacau | 3 | C | Cover C | Cris de Lara | 4 | D | VIP Exclusive Cover, Limited to 200 | Age Velez | 2 | E | 2015 Zenescope Staff Exclusive Cover, Limited to 25 | Age Velez | Missing | Notes:
The VIP Exclusive cover is a homage of Norman Rockwell's Triple Self Portrait painting.
